casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Leroy BARNES. No. 146A94-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2007. George B. Currin, Raleigh, for Barnes. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, William D. Kenerly, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Barnes) shall have up to and including the 19th day of October 2007 to file and serve his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of September 2007."
